thread.title: Danniella Westbrook wraps up wild Marbella getaway with late night trip to the kebab shop
thread.title_full: Danniella Westbrook wraps up wild Marbella getaway with late night trip to the kebab shop

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Danniella Westbrook wraps up wild Marbella getaway with late night trip to the kebab shop
text:
Showbiz Danniella Westbrook wraps up wild Marbella getaway with late night trip to the kebab shop The former EastEnders star was spotted carrying a huge bag full of food in the early hours of the morning Share Late night food run: Danniella Westbrook (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) Share     
Danniella Westbrook spent her last night in Marbella chowing down on a takeaway kebab. 
The former EastEnders actress has been enjoying a wild few weeks in the Spanish holiday resort, but opted for a low-key finish following a night out. 
The 43-year-old was spotted picking up food at 3am and taking selfies inside the takeaway shop before jumping into a taxi. 
Danniella, who was dressed down in a black hooded sweater, black trousers, a fur gillet and trainers, stuck her tongue out to cameras before disappearing into the night. 
It's been a busy few weeks for the actress who's been indulging in everything from pole dancing to snogging Human Ken Doll Rodrigo Alves. Danniella Westbrook grabs a bite to eat at a kebab shop at 3am (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) 
And as she jetted back she expressed how sad she was to leave as she shared a picture taken out of the plane window on Instagram. 
She wrote: "Sad to leave but time to go xoxoxo" Danniella Westbrook grabs a bite to eat at a kebab shop at 3am (Photo: RM70) 
Danniella also said she was feeling "blessed" that she'd managed to turn her life around, writing alongside a selfie: "Super excited to board the plane home to the UK excited to see my babies my mates and get back to work a busy life and no ones wife is a life well lived .. 
"Feeling super blessed at the turn around in my life lately.. hard work determination and never ever letting my problems, my mental health, my bad choices in who I've trusted get the better of me. (Photo: Instagram/danniellawestbrook) Danniella Westbrook 'Loose Women' (Photo: Rex Features) 
"Everything happens for a reason and out of every bad time comes some good. Strength keeps growing my character builds and my faith deepens.. my heart still on my sleeve and my loyalty never broken .. I'm truly grateful for everything I have and for the people I share that with [sic]." (Photo: Instagram/danniellawestbrook) Danniella updated her look with long blonde extensions (Photo: danniellawestbrook/Instagram) 
Meanwhile, Danniella has said said she'd love to return to her role in EastEnders - but fears bosses would just "use" her for PR. She got a new hair do while she was there (Photo: danniellawestbrook/Instagram) 
When asked if she'd ever think about returning to the show, Danniella told The Sun Online : "Always, love EastEnders. The last time I went back fans [wanted me back] because [Sam’s] a superbitch and there’s good tension between her and Sharon and all that stuff. 
"And now because you haven’t got the Pauline, Peggy and Pat types older characters and it needs Sam, Sharon and Roxy but they just won’t do it. 
"They just will not do it. They have said I’m sacked, I’m this and that, they seem to use me for PR and not for the work." Like us on Facebook
